name: Booksmart
description:
This was a very quick game jam made by the Game and Design course of London South Bank University.

The topic was making a game based on 19th century prediction of the year 2000, we were given an image and from that image we had to base our game, our image was a machine that grinded books and through electricity educated children!

The team involved in making the game was:

Producers: Mindaguas Judovirsis, Victor Manuel Alarcon

Coders: Mindaguas Judovirsis, Victor Manuel Alarcon, Ramone Graham

Artists: Jami Dorozala, Najwa Gutale, Sofija Pranevska, Mattew Wilson, Paula Ortega

Sound Design: Abdirahman Yassin, Ben Roberts
